dlcDetailsView.downloadTitle: SQL Server® 2022 for Microsoft® Windows Latest Cumulative Update
dlcDetailsView.downloadDescription: Cumulative Update Package 18 for SQL Server 2022 - KB5050771
dlcDetailsView.detailsSection:
The latest Cumulative Update (CU) download is the most recent CU released for SQL Server 2022 and contains all updates released since the release of SQL Server 2022 RTM.
  • This Cumulative Update includes all fixes from all previous RTM Cumulative Updates, therefore it can be installed to resolve issues fixed in any previous RTM CU
  • The latest 2022 update is CU18 - KB5050771
dlcDetailsView.systemRequirementsSection: For complete system requirements, please reference the detailed Systems Requirements page.
dlcDetailsView.installInstructionSection: After the download has completed, execute the download package on the system where the SQL Server components to be updated are installed and follow the instructions.
